articles.title: Real or fake: Which of these April Fool's announcements were pranks and which were genuine? - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: A "Safe Tee First" T-shirt by Durex? Tom Cruise performing a stunt at Changi Airport? Is this real life?
articles.content: Attention, Tom Cruise fans: Local entertainment site Geek Culture announced on Friday that the Hollywood actor could be flying by Singapore's Changi Airport for the world premiere of his latest film,… [+685 chars]

articles.title: China readies Covid plan after Asian Games venues completed - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: Competition venues for the Asian Games have been completed six months before the eastern Chinese city of Hangzhou hosts athletes from across the region, organisers said Friday.
articles.content: Beijing (AFP) Competition venues for the Asian Games have been completed six months before the eastern Chinese city of Hangzhou hosts athletes from across the region, organisers said Friday. The 19th… [+1946 chars]

articles.title: 'Not as romantic or soft': Why Lee Min-ho wanted to play the anti-hero in Pachinko - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The South Korean superstar also tells CNA Lifestyle he tried to "provide as much authenticity as possible" while taking on the role of Hansu in Apple TV+'s sweeping epic.
articles.content:
From the outset, Pachinko might not be your typical massive international hit K-drama. Its not Squid Game, and its certainly not Crash Landing On You.
